description: Run SQL queries to retrieve metadata and time-series data from asset models, assets, measurements, metrics, transforms, and aggregates.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: columns
nested_items.description: Represents a single column in the query results.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the column description.

nested_items.name: scalarType
nested_items.description: The allowed data types that the column has as it's value.

nested_items.name: rows
nested_items.description: Represents a single row in the query results.

nested_items.name: data
nested_items.description: List of data points in a single row of the result set.

nested_items.name: scalarValue
nested_items.description: Indicates if the data point is a scalar value such as integer, string, double, or Boolean.

nested_items.name: arrayValue
nested_items.description: Indicates if the data point is an array.

nested_items.name: nullValue
nested_items.description: Indicates if the data point is null.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string that specifies the next page of results.
